questions.title: How do you approach conflicts or disagreements?
options: I prefer to calmly discuss and analyze the situation
I express my emotions openly and address the issue head-on
I try to avoid conflicts and maintain harmony
My approach varies depending on the situation and the people involved

questions.title: When working in a team, do you:
options: Take charge and lead the group
Offer support and encouragement to others
Focus on completing your own tasks efficiently
Adapt your role depending on the team's needs

questions.title: How do you prefer to communicate with others?
options: Directly and straightforwardly
With empathy and understanding
By focusing on the facts and logical arguments
I adjust my communication style based on the situation and the person

questions.title: When planning your future, do you:
options: Set clear goals and work systematically towards them
Allow room for flexibility and spontaneity
Focus on maintaining stability and security
Balance long-term planning with adaptability to change

questions.title: What is most important to you in a friendship?
options: Loyalty and trust
Intellectual stimulation and shared interests
Emotional support and understanding
Fun and shared experiences

questions.title: How do you cope with stress or difficult situations?
options: I analyze the situation and find practical solutions
I rely on my intuition and emotions to guide me
I seek support and advice from others
I adapt my coping strategies depending on the situation

questions.title: Which of the following best describes your decision-making style?
options: Logical and objective
Emotionally driven and instinctive
Pragmatic and focused on practical outcomes
A combination of logic, emotion, and practical considerations
